data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinaccrual.rotext
data.value: The selected justification is being used in some balance and cannot be deleted. It is used in the following balances: ${1}

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedincauses.rotext
data.value: The selected justification has been entered ${1} times manually

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinequivalencedata.rotext
data.value: The selected justification is used to make equivalences with other justifications

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinprogrammedabsence.rotext
data.value: The selected justification is currently being used for an extended absence and cannot be deleted. It is used for extended absences for the following users: ${1}

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinprogrammedcause.rotext
data.value: The selected justification is currently being used in a planned issue and cannot be deleted. It is used in planned issues for the following users: ${1}

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinprogrammedholiday.rotext
data.value: The selected justification is used in hourly vacation forecasts

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinpunchwithincidence.rotext
data.value: The selected justification was used in a clocking with an incident from a terminal. You cannot delete the justification.

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinrequest.rotext
data.value: The selected justification is being used in one or more requests.

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinrequestrule.rotext
data.value: The selected justification is being used in some request rule and cannot be deleted. It is used in the following rules: ${1}

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinshift.rotext
data.value: The selected justification is currently in use at a certain time and cannot be deleted. It is used at the following times: ${1}

data.name: RES_resultenum.changetypenotallowed.rotext
data.value: You cannot change the justification type because it is already being used.

data.name: RES_resultenum.conceptbalanceannualqueryrequired.rotext
data.value: An annual balance must be selected and displayed in hours

data.name: RES_resultenum.invalidjustifyperioddates.rotext
data.value: The incidence period between hours is incorrect.

data.name: RES_resultenum.invalidname.rotext
data.value: Name cannot be empty or already exists

data.name: RES_resultenum.invalidreaderinputcode.rotext
data.value: The justification code is incorrect.

data.name: RES_resultenum.invalidroundingby.rotext
data.value: Rounding cannot be 0 or a negative value.

data.name: RES_resultenum.invalidshortname.rotext
data.value: You must indicate the short name of the justification

data.name: RES_resultenum.namealreadyexist.rotext
data.value: The name of the justification already exists.

data.name: RES_resultenum.numberofcausesexceeded.rotext
data.value: You have exceeded the maximum number of justifications for the Visualtime eXpress license.

data.name: RES_resultenum.readerinputcodeexistent.rotext
data.value: The justification code is already in use or is incorrect.

data.name: RES_resultenum.shortnamealreadeyexist.rotext
data.value: The short name for justification already exists.

data.name: RES_resultenum.typedoesnotallowdocumenttracking.rotext
data.value: This justification has follow-up documents, and its type cannot be changed. Please delete the documents first, or create a new justification.

data.name: RES_resultenum.userfieldempty.rotext
data.value: You must select a field from the card and/or a value.

data.name: RES_resultenum.causeusedinlabagree.rotext
data.value: The selected justification is being used in some convention and cannot be deleted. It is used in the following conventions: ${1}

data.name: RES_resultenum.xssvalidationerror.rotext
data.value: A malicious script has been detected in some property of the object
